title: NPC Agents: Full Implementation Roadmap
description: Complete implementation roadmap for NPC Agents framework. Five phases: (1) Context Injection — on-demand full character context via CLI output, (2) Extensible Systems — pluggable behavioral taxonomies with systems/ directory and manifests, (3) System Builder — interactive flow for creating custom systems, (4) Character & Party Builder — interactive character/party creation that validates extensibility, (5) Quest & Debate Mode — enhanced quest system with debate mode and per-member context. Key architectural decisions: no SessionStart hook (removed), injection via CLI output on assume/context commands, no selective depth layering (full context always), drop alignment slash commands in favor of /npc set, customer perspective preamble as stances/customer.md file.
notes: {"decisions":["On-demand injection via CLI output, not SessionStart hook","Full character context always — no selective layering or depth levels","Extensible systems before builders (infrastructure before tooling)","Drop alignment/class slash commands, use /npc set instead","Customer preamble stored as stances/customer.md file","Builder validates extensible systems (Phase 4 tests Phase 2)","Quest/debate mode last, built on stable foundation"]}

title: Phase 1: Context Injection System
description: On-demand full character context injection via CLI output. Remove SessionStart hook. npc assume outputs complete profile (alignment SKILL.md + class SKILL.md + perspective preamble + persona + convictions + reflexes + history). New npc context command for read-only context loading. npc set outputs profiles for anonymous mode. Create stances/customer.md. Update CLAUDE.md for on-demand model. Update skill-context.sh as state summary only.
notes: {"tasks":["Add npc context <name> command (read-only full context output)","Modify npc assume to output full behavioral profile inline","Modify npc set to output alignment+class content inline","Create stances/customer.md (customer perspective preamble)","Remove load-alignment.sh SessionStart hook from settings.json","Update skill-context.sh to include character field summary","Update CLAUDE.md to reflect on-demand injection model","Update quest SKILL.md to use npc context for per-member loading"]}
close_reason: Phase 1 complete: on-demand context injection via CLI replaces SessionStart hook

title: Phase 2: Extensible Systems
description: Full abstraction layer making behavioral taxonomies pluggable. Create systems/alignment-grid/ directory with system.yaml manifest. Move alignment profiles to dispositions/, class profiles to domains/, create stance profiles in stances/. Drop alignment/class slash commands. Refactor bin/npc for manifest-driven profile resolution. Add npc system subcommands (list, use, show, validate). Refactor alignment-restrictions.sh to read safety constraints from manifest. Backward compat: characters without system label default to alignment-grid.
notes: {"tasks":["Create systems/alignment-grid/ directory structure","Write system.yaml manifest for default system","Move 9 alignment profiles to systems/alignment-grid/dispositions/","Move 6 class profiles to systems/alignment-grid/domains/","Create developer.md and customer.md in systems/alignment-grid/stances/","Delete alignment/class slash command SKILL.md files from .claude/skills/","Refactor bin/npc profile resolution to read from active system manifest","Add npc system subcommands: list, use, show, validate","Refactor alignment-restrictions.sh for manifest-driven safety rules","Update skill-context.sh for system-aware state","Backward compatibility for characters without system label","Update CLAUDE.md for extensible systems"]}
close_reason: Phase 2 complete: extensible systems with manifest-driven behavioral taxonomy

title: Phase 3: System Builder
description: Interactive /build system flow for creating custom behavioral systems. From-scratch flow: domain discovery, axis definition, value elicitation, profile generation, composition check, safety rules, system preview. Clone/modify flow (--from). Extension flow (--extend). Template flow (--template). Multi-session progress tracking. Profile authoring guidelines enforced during generation.
notes: {"tasks":["Create /build skill SKILL.md with system builder dispatch","Implement from-scratch flow (7 phases)","Implement clone/modify flow (--from <system>)","Implement extension flow (--extend <system>)","Implement template flow (--template <name>)","Add multi-session progress tracking and resume","Add npc system create and npc system validate CLI commands","Profile quality checks: principles as decision tools, heuristics as situational, actions as concrete/overridable","Disposition differentiation validation"]}
close_reason: Implemented: system create/validate CLI, /build skill with 7-phase flow, --from/--extend/--resume variants, progress tracking

title: Phase 4: Character & Party Builder
description: Interactive /build flow for character creation and party assembly. Full 8-phase character builder: intent, perspective, alignment+class, history, convictions, reflexes, persona synthesis, preview+confirmation. Quick mode for experienced users. Party assembly flow with composition suggestions, recruit-or-build logic, party review. Template library (developer and customer archetypes, party templates). Also serves as integration test for Phase 2 extensible systems.
notes: {"tasks":["Create character builder flow in /build SKILL.md (8 phases)","Implement quick mode (/build quick <name> <alignment> <class> --for)","Implement party assembly flow (/build party for <purpose>)","Build character template library (Guardian, Hacker, Architect, Pragmatist, Skeptic, Power User, New Adopter, Administrator, Evaluator, Reluctant User)","Build party template library (Red/Blue Team, Architecture Review, Feature Planning, Product Feedback, Devils Advocate)","Integration test: create characters in alignment-grid system to validate Phase 2","Cross-perspective party creation test"]}
close_reason: Implemented: 8-phase character builder, 4-phase party assembly, quick mode, 10 character templates + 5 party templates in /build skill

title: Phase 5: Quest & Debate Mode
description: Enhanced quest system built on completed framework. Update quest SKILL.md to use npc context for per-member full context loading. New --mode debate with three-phase flow: Positions (each member states core position), Exchange (2-3 rounds of direct engagement), Synthesis (arbiter reads all and produces merged recommendation). Arbiter is Neutral Good, no class, synthesis-only. Add --conviction flag for quest-level shared convictions that apply to all party members. Concession principle in synthesis: every surviving position represented proportionally.
notes: {"tasks":["Update quest SKILL.md to use npc context for per-member loading","Add --mode debate to quest argument parsing","Implement Position phase (each member states 2-4 sentence position)","Implement Exchange phase (2-3 rounds, must address others by name)","Implement Synthesis phase (arbiter produces merged recommendation)","Define arbiter agent spec (Neutral Good, no class, synthesis-only)","Add --conviction flag for quest-level shared convictions","Implement debate output format (positions, exchange rounds, synthesis with surviving points table, unresolved tensions, concessions)","Update quest briefing to show depth fields when available"]}
